# iru_device_apps (Data Source)

List apps installed on a specific device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_apps" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "installed_apps" {
  value = data.iru_device_apps.example.apps
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `apps` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--apps))

<a id="nestedatt--apps"></a>
### Nested Schema for `apps`

Read-Only:

- `bundle_id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `version` (String)
